𝗣𝗛𝗢𝗘𝗡𝗜𝗫 | Web development with a focus on JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, providing a lightweight and fun coding experience.  🔥 Super Hot!

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📜 JavaScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Web development with a focus on JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, providing a lightweight and fun coding experience.
📅 Created: Aug 2021 • Updated: Jun 2025

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Web development focus (JS, HTML, CSS)
✅ Game-like UX for code editing
✅ Lightweight editor
✅ Brackets extension compatibility
✅ Local development experience
✅ Pluggable remote back-ends
✅ Static web server compatibility
✅ Auditable and readable source code


❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2.2K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 146 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 217 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Phoenix is a modern, open-source text editor designed for web development, emphasizing a game-like user experience to make coding more enjoyable. It supports Brackets extensions, offers a seamless local development environment, and is built to be lightweight and easily auditable. The editor prioritizes simplicity and ease of development, aiming to provide a fast and efficient coding experience.

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/phcode-dev/phoenix

𝗪𝗜𝗡𝗛𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗥 | Hiding specific application windows from being visible during screen sharing sessions and from the taskbar/taskswitcher, while still allowing the user to interact with them.  

•••••••••••••••••••••••

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🔨 C++ 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Hiding specific application windows from being visible during screen sharing sessions and from the taskbar/taskswitcher, while still allowing the user to interact with them.
📅 Created: May 2025 • Updated: Jun 2025

•••••••••••••••••••••••

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Hides windows from screensharing
✅ Hides windows from taskbar and taskswitcher (Alt-Tab)
✅ GUI and CLI interface
✅ DLL injection for hiding/unhiding windows


•••••••••••••••••••••••

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐ 15 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 0 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 2 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

•••••••••••••••••••••••

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

WinHider is a C++ application that allows users to selectively hide windows from screensharing applications and the taskbar/taskswitcher. It provides both a GUI and CLI interface for managing window visibility, utilizing DLL injection to achieve its functionality.

•••••••••••••••••••••••

• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/aamitn/winhider

𝗔𝗗𝗗𝗢𝗡 | Automatically remove tracking elements from URLs to protect user privacy while browsing the internet.  🔥 Super Hot!

✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📜 JavaScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Automatically remove tracking elements from URLs to protect user privacy while browsing the internet.
📅 Created: Aug 2017 • Updated: Jun 2025

✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Removes tracking from URLs automatically
✅ Blocks some common ad domains (optional)
✅ Built-in tool to clean up multiple URLs at once
✅ Supports redirection without tracking services
✅ Adds context menu entry for copying clean links
✅ Blocks hyperlink auditing (ping tracking)
✅ Prevents ETag tracking
✅ Prevents tracking injection over history API
✅ Prevents Google and Yandex from rewriting search results with tracking elements


✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿

🍴 113 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 206 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿✿

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

ClearURLs is a browser add-on that automatically removes tracking elements from URLs, enhancing user privacy. It supports multiple browsers and offers features like blocking ad domains, cleaning multiple URLs, and preventing various tracking methods. The add-on aims to provide a cleaner and more private browsing experience by eliminating unnecessary tracking parameters from web addresses.

𝗠𝗢𝗥𝗧 | Real-time translation of game dialogs using OCR and machine translation or database lookups.  🔥 Super Hot!

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🔷 C# 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Real-time translation of game dialogs using OCR and machine translation or database lookups.
📅 Created: Jun 2016 • Updated: Jun 2025

✅ Realtime translate
✅ OCR (TesseractOCR, Windows OCR, NHOcr, Easy OCR)
✅ Machine translation (Naver Papago, Google Web, Google Sheet, ezTrans, DeepL)
✅ Language Patch with using DB
✅ Multiple OCR areas
✅ Image adjust
✅ Custom API support

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

MORT is a real-time game translator that extracts dialog from the screen using OCR and provides translations via machine translation services or a database. It supports multiple OCR engines and translation providers, allowing users to customize the translation process. The program is designed to help users understand foreign language games by providing instant translations of in-game text.

♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Network booting of operating systems and utilities using PXE.
📅 Created: Aug 2023 • Updated: Jun 2025

❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ PXE boot server
✅ DHCP Proxy Mode support
✅ HTTP file sharing via the 'files' directory
✅ Customizable menu via menu.ejs
✅ BIOS and UEFI support
✅ Configuration via config.ini or web interface


❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

TFTP-NP is a PXE boot server that allows users to boot operating systems and utilities over a network. It supports both BIOS and UEFI systems and offers features like DHCP Proxy Mode, HTTP file sharing, and customizable menus. The server is configured through a config file or a web interface.

𝗙𝗥𝗣 | Exposing local servers behind NAT or firewalls to the internet.  📈 Growing!

✅ TCP and UDP support
✅ HTTP and HTTPS support

✅ Configuration files
✅ Environment variables
✅ Server dashboard

✅ Prometheus monitoring

✅ KCP and QUIC protocol support
✅ Connection pooling

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

frp is a fast reverse proxy that enables users to expose local servers, even those behind NAT or firewalls, to the internet. It supports various protocols like TCP, UDP, HTTP, and HTTPS, and offers features such as P2P connectivity, encryption, compression, and monitoring. frp simplifies the process of accessing internal services from external networks.

⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

JumpServer is an open-source Privileged Access Management (PAM) tool designed to provide DevOps and IT teams with secure, on-demand access to SSH, RDP, Kubernetes, Database, and RemoteApp endpoints. It acts as a bastion host, centralizing and securing access through a web browser, enhancing security and simplifying access management.

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 💻 Shell 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Securely managing and accessing sensitive environment variables in shell scripts.
📅 Created: Feb 2020 • Updated: Jun 2025

◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦◦

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Encrypts environment variables using GPG.
✅ Reads secret values from encrypted files.
✅ Provides a login function to set environment variables.
✅ Includes a logout function to unset environment variables.
✅ Updates the SECRET_LOGIN environment variable for shell prompt customization.
✅ Offers autocomplete for available secret files.

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

The shell-secrets repository provides a tool for managing environment variables by encrypting them with GPG. It allows users to securely store sensitive information in encrypted files and then easily load them into the environment using a simple login/logout mechanism. This helps prevent storing secrets in plain text shell files.
